channel.title: Project '06, where legends come to play
channel.description:
well, today i am going to start working on my '06 remake, and this i swear will not fail.
[b][size=14pt]Base:[/size][/b]PI/emu
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2w5k61k.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/14vn4ao.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/345etsx.png[/img] __________________________________________________________________________ 4.0 - Skills and other features in progress
[b][size=14pt]Combat:[/size][/b] *PvP fully complete *Perfect max hit formulas *Perfect accuracy formula *Equipment requirements
[b][size=14pt]Magic:[/size][/b] Every modern combat spell *Can't mage through walls *Staves that give unlimited amount of runes working *Bones to bananas *Bones to Peache's *Weakening spells *bind, snare, entangle *Teleports, teleothers *Alching *Superheat *Enchanting jewelry
[b][size=14pt]Prayer:[/size][/b] *All bones bury-able *Every prayer working properly *Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate
[b][size=14pt]Mining:[/size][/b] *Emptying and refilling rocks *All ores can be mined *Correct pickaxe finding and animations *Prospecting *Random chance of obtaining gems *Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms
[b][size=14pt]Firemaking:[/size][/b] *All logs light able *Adding and depleting of lightened logs *Ashes appear after logs burn out *Correct animations *Clipped
[b][size=14pt]Woodcutting:[/size][/b] *Stumps and regrowing trees *Correct hatchet finding *Correct hatchet animations *Most trees cut-able except regular tree
[b][size=14pt]Crafting: 40%[/size][/b] *Cutting gems *Making amulets, necklaces, and rings *Stringing amulets *Tanning normal and hard leather *Crafting normal and hard leather.. *Spinning wool *Making pottery
[b][size=14pt]Cooking:[/size][/b] *All fish can be cooked *All meats can be cooked *Grinding wheat into flour *Cakes *Pies *Pizza *Stew [color=yellow]*Wine[/color] *Correct burning formula *Lumbridge cooking range bonus *Eating food (in pieces) *Correct animation and timing used
[b][size=14pt]Rune Crafting:[/size][/b] *Multiple rune crafting *All alters *Pouches *Talisman Locating
[b][size=14pt]Quests:[/size][/b] Cook's Assistant Deserts Treasure Doric's Quest Horror From the Deep Recipe for disaster Black Knights' Fortress Witch's Potion etc.
[b][size=14pt]Tutorial Island:[/size][/b] [color=red]*RuneScape Instructor *Fishing/Woodcutting/Firemaking Instructor *Cooking instructor *Quest instructor *Mining/Smithing instructor *Combat instructor *Money instructor *Prayer instructor *Magic instructor *Correct hint arrows *Doors
Credits: Izumi Sanity Matt Infamy

item.title: Project '06, where legends come to play
item.dc:creator: @godswords godswords
item.description:
@godswords wrote:

well, today i am going to start working on my '06 remake, and this i swear will not fail.

[size=14pt]Base:[/size]PI/emu

2w5k61k.png765×503

14vn4ao.png764×499

345etsx.png762×506

4.0 - Skills and other features in progress

[size=14pt]Combat:[/size]
*PvP fully complete
*Perfect max hit formulas
*Perfect accuracy formula
*Equipment requirements

[size=14pt]Magic:[/size]
Every modern combat spell
*Can’t mage through walls
*Staves that give unlimited amount of runes working
*Bones to bananas
*Bones to Peache’s
*Weakening spells
*bind, snare, entangle
*Teleports, teleothers
*Alching
*Superheat
*Enchanting jewelry

[size=14pt]Prayer:[/size]
*All bones bury-able
*Every prayer working properly
*Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate

[size=14pt]Mining:[/size]
*Emptying and refilling rocks
*All ores can be mined
*Correct pickaxe finding and animations
*Prospecting
*Random chance of obtaining gems
*Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms

[size=14pt]Firemaking:[/size]
*All logs light able
*Adding and depleting of lightened logs
*Ashes appear after logs burn out
*Correct animations
*Clipped

[size=14pt]Woodcutting:[/size]
*Stumps and regrowing trees
*Correct hatchet finding
*Correct hatchet animations
*Most trees cut-able except regular tree

[size=14pt]Crafting: 40%[/size]
*Cutting gems
*Making amulets, necklaces, and rings
*Stringing amulets
*Tanning normal and hard leather
*Crafting normal and hard leather…
*Spinning wool
*Making pottery

[size=14pt]Cooking:[/size]
*All fish can be cooked
*All meats can be cooked
*Grinding wheat into flour
*Cakes
*Pies
*Pizza
*Stew
[color=yellow]*Wine[/color]
*Correct burning formula
*Lumbridge cooking range bonus
*Eating food (in pieces)
*Correct animation and timing used

[size=14pt]Rune Crafting:[/size]
*Multiple rune crafting
*All alters
*Pouches
*Talisman Locating

[size=14pt]Quests:[/size]
Cook’s Assistant
Deserts Treasure
Doric’s Quest
Horror From the Deep
Recipe for disaster
Black Knights’ Fortress
Witch’s Potion
etc.

[size=14pt]Tutorial Island:[/size]
[color=red]*RuneScape Instructor
*Fishing/Woodcutting/Firemaking Instructor
*Cooking instructor
*Quest instructor
*Mining/Smithing instructor
*Combat instructor
*Money instructor
*Prayer instructor
*Magic instructor
*Correct hint arrows
*Doors

Credits:
Izumi
Sanity
Matt
Infamy
